text: Gunter Gabriel (born Günter Caspelherr; 11 June 1942 – 22 June 2017) was a German singer, musician and composer. Gabriel became famous in Germany as singer of Schlager songs.Tagesspiegel:Mein gößter Feind bin ich; accessed 22 June 2017. He published Wer einmal tief im Keller saß. Erinnerungen eines Rebellen with Oliver Flesch in 2009. Gabriel died on 22 June 2017 in Hannover from complications of a fall at the age of 75. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1942 births Category:2017 deaths Category:German singers Category:Writers from North Rhine-Westphalia Category:German musicians Category:20th-century German composers Category:21st-century German composers
title: Gunter Gabriel
